entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, Harry is thinking about his past experience with dementors.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend Ron is looking at him anxiously and trying to avoid talking about the Whomping Willow.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend Hermione is also looking at him anxiously and hesitant to talk about the Whomping Willow.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that have affected Harry in the past, causing a screaming voice.

entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: A violent tree on the school grounds that doesn't like being hit.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a teacher who brought back the Whomping Willow before Harry came around.

entities.name: nimbus
entities.description: Harry's broomstick that got blown away when he fell off.

relationships.description: Dementors have affected Harry in the past, causing a screaming voice.
Ron is looking at Harry anxiously and trying to avoid talking about the Whomping Willow.
Hermione is also looking at Harry anxiously and hesitant to talk about the Whomping Willow.
The Whomping Willow hit Harry's broomstick, the Nimbus.
Professor Flitwick brought back the Whomping Willow before Harry came around.
